channel.title: I downloaded richscape to make my server but when i click run
channel.description: when i click run it says: 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue... Btw i download jdk 6 update 10 so i have recent one. how can i connect successfully?

item.title: I downloaded richscape to make my server but when i click run
item.dc:creator: @visiblesound visiblesound
item.description:

@echo off
title RichScape client
java -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 lowmem members 32
pause

environmental variables? then yes lemme tell you the class path and path:

classpath: CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

path: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin;
